expected_goal: Generate numerical training data, compute descriptive statistics, train a regression model, generate predictions, and email the report if target variance is below threshold.

atomic: Generate a sample of numerical training data.
Compute descriptive statistics for the generated data.
Train a linear regression model on the data.
Generate predictions using the trained model.
Check if the variance of the target variable is below the threshold.
Variance is low, compose and send an email with the report.
All tasks for the low-variance scenario are complete.
Variance is above threshold, no email needed.
All tasks for the high-variance scenario are complete.
